creditline: Gift of Ms. Sheryl R. Johnson, wife of artist Paul Lamantia
description: busy, colorful layered image rendered in multicolored pigments; humanoid figure lying in supine position with a vertical thick black tree puncturing figure's eye in LRC; figure with branches protruding from head and arms, with gaping red mouth and sharp teeth, adorned in orange and black 'amoeba' shapes throughout body on left; large head in profile view with large mouth and large teeth in URC
inscription: on back, in bottom left, in black ink: \"TO RECAPTURE MY MIND\" | 1969- DRAWING | MIXED MEDIUM | L 42\" X W 30 3/8 | #17
medium: Gouache, black ink marker, pen and black ink, graphite, scraping out, and collage on paper
provenance: The artist, Chicago; Sheryl R. Johnson, Chicago (wife of the artist); given to MIA, 2018.
signed: on back, in bottom left, in black ink: PAUL LAMANTIA {circled}
title: To Recapture My Mind
